Package com.rpgcraft.gui

Holds code regarding the drawing of the in game Graphical User Interfaces.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ContainerFreezer
    More tutorial code that will be soon outdated.
    ContainerItem
    Written as part of a tutorial.
    GuiAdvancedHUDConfiguration
    The name kind of gives it away here.
    GuiBuffBar
    Draws a buff bar in the upper-left corner of the screen.
    GuiButtonIconGrid
    Still not mine.
    GuiHudItemButton
    Also borrowed from the Advanced HUD mod.
    GuiItemInventory
    More code borrowed from Advanced HUD.
    GuiManaBar
    Tutorial code.
    GuiScreenHudItem
    Acts as parent class to all of the HUD Items.
    GuiScreenReposition
    This is from the advanced HUD mod.
    SkillGui
    The popup window for class selection - TO BE REFRACTORED.
    SlotItemInv
    Acts as a single item slot inside of an inventory.
    TutorialGui
    Part of a tutorial.

Package com.rpgcraft.gui Description

Holds code regarding the drawing of the in game Graphical User Interfaces.
